participant_1.background:
I'm a mystery movie fan and a baker.
my father died when i was 2.
i need to use an inhaler sometimes.
I have a close relationship with my family despite my hectic schedule.
I want a home with a big yard for my dogs to run and play in.

participant_2.background:
I have a secret stash of snacks in my room that my parents don't know about.
i have been at my job for seven years.
I'm often not taken seriously because of my pink hair.
I want to use my skills to help people in need.
during the week , i work as a barista.

content.text: I'm a barista during the week, but I love to volunteer at my local soup kitchen.
That's great! I want to use my skills to help people in need. What's your favorite part about volunteering?
I like making people smile and hearing their stories.
That's so nice. I'm a mystery movie fan and a baker. What are your favorite things to bake?
I love making cupcakes! I've been working on a new recipe for chocolate cupcakes with vanilla buttercream frosting.
Yum! That sounds delicious. I'm always trying new recipes, but I'm not very good at baking.
I'm sure you're better than you think!
Thanks! I'm not so sure about that, but I'm learning.
I guess you're right. I'll keep practicing!
You should! I'm sure you'll be a great baker in no time.
